FuncDef: This command configures a physical port that will act as the working circuit for this APS group. The working circuit port must contain only the default configuration and cannot be part of another APS group. The working circuit must be created before the protection circuit.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port that will act as the working circuit for this APS group in the following format:.
Specifies the APS channel number; value is 1 or 2.
